name: Wishing Well Hotel
description:
Wishing Well Hotel is a visual novel comedy game centered around a hotel full of mysterious suspects with some light minigames intertwined within it. Your objective is to discover the true mastermind behind this mystery and this hotel's weird collection of guests.

This is a beta prototype of the game finished for Abertay's Mprof in Games Development.

Credits:

- Nathan Anderson (Artist): https://nathananderson15.itch.io/

- Gray (Programmer): https://itch.io/profile/gwendolinn

- Kevin (Programmer): https://kevindu.itch.io/

- Juan Lopez (Game Designer / Producer): https://turcobandido.itch.io/
